titleStmt.title: [Royal letter] to His Tsarist Majesty [Peter I] from [the Holy Roman] Emperor [Charles VI]. [...] On the victory over the Turks
[Грамота] К его ц[а]рскому величеству [Петру I] от цесаря [Карла VI]. [...] О виктории, полученной над турками
titleStmt.author: Holy
Roman
Emperor
Charles VI
Karl
Ludwig

body.div:
22 August 1717. – [Royal letter] to His Tsarist Majesty [Peter I] from the [Holy Roman] Emperor[,] [Charles VI]. [...] On the victory over the Turks
RGADA, fond 32, opis 4, no. 39, f. 1–1v. Latin original. Translation from Latin into Russian: RGADA, fond 32, opis 4, no. 39, f. 2.
Carolus Sextus Diuinā favente clementiā Electus Romanorum Imperator Semper Augustus, ac Rex Germaniæ, Castellæ, Aragoniæ, Legionis, utriūs Siciliæ, Herusalem, Hungariæ, Bohemiæ, Dalmatiæ, Croatiæ, Sclavoniæ, Navarræ, Granatæ, Toleti, Valentiæ, Gallitiæ, Majoricarum, Seviliæ, Sardiniæ, Cordubæ, Corsicæ, Murciæ, Giennis, Algarbiæ, Algeziræ, Gibraltaris, Insularum Canariæ et Indiarum, ac terræ firmæ, Maris Oceani, Archidux Austriæ, Dux Burgundiæ, Brabantiæ, Mediolani, Styriæ, Carinthiæ, Carniolæ, Limburgiæ, Lucemburgiæ, Geldriæ, Wirtembergæ, superioris et inferioris Silesiæ, Calabriæ, Athenarum et Neopatriæ, Princeps Sueviæ, Cataloniæ et Asturiæ, Marchio sacri Romani Impery, Burgoviæ, Moraviæ, superioris et inferioris Lusatiæ, Comes Habspurgi, Flandriæ, Tyrolis, Ferretis, Kyburgi, Goritiæ et Arthesiæ, Landgravius Alsatiæ, Marchio Oristhani, Comes Goziani, Namurci, Rossilionis et Ceritaniæ, Dominus Marchiæ Sclavonicæ, Portūs Naonis, Biscajæ, Molinæ, Salinarum, Tripolis et Mechliniæ p[erge] Serenissimo et Potentissimo Domino Tzaro et Magno Duci Petro Alexievicio totius magnæ, parvæ et albæ Russiæ, Autocratori Moscoviæ, Kyoviæ, Volodomiriæ, Novogardiæ, Tzaro Casani, Tzaro Astracani, Tzaro Sibiriæ, Domino Pleskoviæ, et Magno Duci Smolensciæ, Tweriæ, Iugoriæ, Permiæ, Veatkæ, Bolgariæ, aliorumque Domino et Magno Duci Novogardiæ inferioris terræ, Tsernigoviæ, Resaniæ, Rostoviæ, Iaroslaviæ, Beloosiriæ, Udoriæ, Obdoriæ, Condiniæ, ac totius Septentrionalis Oræ Dominatori et Domino Iveriæ terræ, Cartalinensium et Grussensium, Tzaro etiam Cabardiensis terræ, Tserkassiensium et Gorissensium Ducum, nec non aliorum multorum Orientalium, Occidentalium et Septentrionalium dominiorum et ditionu[m] Paterno et Avito Hæredi, Successori, Domino et Dominatori, Amico et Fratri Nostro charissimo Salutem et amicitiam Nostram cum omnis boni incremento Serenissime et Potentissime Princeps, Amice et Frater charissime. Habet quōd Summoperē lætetur universa christianitas de insigni vicrtoria, quam Dei optimi Maximi auxilio die decimā Sextā hujus mensis post cruentum Septem horarum prælium prope Albam Græcam ā Turcis ad eō completē reportavimus, ut Eorundem multis millibus trucidatis, et castris Suis cum omnibus tormentis bellicis alysque impedimentis victorioso Militi Nostro in prædam datis reliqui fugam arripuerint, eaquepropter paulō post etiam prædicta Alba Græca deditione in potestatem Nostram venerit; Nihil itaque Nobis cunctandum existimavimus, quin Serenitatem Vestram, Cui tam fortunatos Rei Christianæ eventus jucundissimos fore confidimus, de ys mox certiorem redderemus, Eidem de reliquo prospera quævis ex animo cupientes. Datum in Civitate Nostra Viennæ die vigesimā Secundā mensis Augusti Anno Domini Millesimo Septingentesimo decimo Septimo, Regnorum Nostrorum, Romani Sexto, Hispanicorum decimo quarto, Hungarici et Bohemici verō Septimo.
Serenitatis Vestræ
Bonus Frater
Carolus
m[anu] p[ropria]
V[idi]t Carolus Ludovicus Comes ā Sinzendorff.~. Petrus Josephus Dolberg
m[anu] p[ropr]ia
Serenissimo et Potentissimo Domino Tzaro et Magno Duci Petro Alexievicio totius magnæ, parvæ et albæ Russiæ, Autocratori Moscoviæ, Kyoviæ, Volodomiriæ, Novogardiæ, Tzaro Casani, Tzaro Astracani, Tzaro sibiriæ, Domino Pleskoviæ et Magno Duci Smolensciæ, Tweriæ, Iugoriæ, Permiæ, Veatkæ, Bolgariæ aliorumque Domino et Magno Duci Novogardiæ inferioris terræ, Tsernigoviæ, Resaniæ, Rostoviæ, Iaroslaviæ, Beloosiriæ, Udoriæ, Obdoriæ, Condiniæ, ac totius Septentrionalis Oræ Dominatori et Domino Iveriæ terræ, Cartalinensium et Grussensium, Tzaro etiam Cabardiensis terræ, Tserkassiensium et Gorissensium Ducum, nec non aliorum multorum Orientalium, Occidentalium et Septentrionalium dominiorum et ditionum Paterno et Avito Hæredi, Successori, Domino et Dominatori, Amico et Fratri Nostro charissimo.~.
К его ц[а]рскому величеству от цесаря. Получена в Берлине сентября в 9 день 1717 году. О виктории, полученной над турками. Also see: ru_rgada_32_4_37_0001 ru_rgada_32_4_45_0001 ru_rgada_32_4_41_0001
